item.title: Bobby add a quote by Pat Conroy
item.description: "You get a little moody sometimes but I think that's because you like to read. People that like to read are always a little fucked up." -- Pat Conroy

item.title: Bobby add a quote by Pat Conroy
item.description: "American men are allotted just as many tears as American women. But because we are forbidden to shed them, we die long before women do, with our hearts exploding or our blood pressure rising or our livers eaten away by alcohol because that lake of grief inside us has no outlet. We, men, die because our faces were not watered enough." -- Pat Conroy

item.title: Bobby add a quote by Pat Conroy
item.description: "Music could ache and hurt, that beautiful music was a place a suffering man could hide." -- Pat Conroy

item.title: Bobby add a quote by Pat Conroy
item.description: "Her laughter was a shiny thing, like pewter flung high in the air." -- Pat Conroy

item.title: Bobby add a quote by Pat Conroy
item.description: "Men are prisoners of their genitalia and women are the keepers of the keys to paradise." -- Pat Conroy
